verses.verse: From the place of His dwelling He looks On all the inhabitants of the earth;
He fashions their hearts individually; ((2 Chr. 16:9); Job 34:21; (Jer. 32:19)) He considers all their works.
(Ps. 44:6; 60:11; (Jer. 9:23, 24)) No king is saved by the multitude of an army; A mighty man is not delivered by great strength.
((Ps. 20:7; 147:10; Prov. 21:31)) A horse is a vain hope for safety; Neither shall it deliver any by its great strength.
((Job 36:7); Ps. 32:8; 34:15; (1 Pet. 3:12)) Behold, the eye of the LORD is on those who fear Him, On those who hope in His mercy,
To deliver their soul from death, And (Job 5:20; Ps. 37:19) to keep them alive in famine.
Our soul waits for the LORD; He is our help and our shield.
For our heart shall rejoice in Him, Because we have trusted in His holy name.
Let Your mercy, O LORD, be upon us, Just as we hope in You.

The Happiness of Those Who Trust in God A Psalm of David (1 Sam. 21:10-15) when he pretended madness before Abimelech, who drove him away, and he departed. ([1]) I will bless the LORD at all times; His praise shall continually be in my mouth.
My soul shall make its boast in the LORD; The humble shall hear of it and be glad.
Oh, magnify the LORD with me, And let us exalt His name together.
I ((2 Chr. 15:2; Ps. 9:10; Matt. 7:7; Luke 11:9)) sought the LORD, and He heard me, And delivered me from all my fears.
They looked to Him and were radiant, And their faces were not ashamed.
This poor man cried out, and the LORD heard him, And saved him out of all his troubles.
((Ps. 91:11); Dan. 6:22) The angel of the LORD (2 Kin. 6:17) encamps all around those who fear Him, And delivers them.
Oh, (Ps. 119:103; (Heb. 6:5); 1 Pet. 2:3) taste and see that the LORD is good; (Ps. 2:12) Blessed is the man who trusts in Him!
Oh, fear the LORD, you His saints! There is no want to those who fear Him.
The young lions lack and suffer hunger; ((Ps. 84:11)) But those who seek the LORD shall not lack any good thing.
Come, you children, listen to me; (Ps. 32:8) I will teach you the fear of the LORD.
((1 Pet. 3:10-12)) Who is the man who desires life, And loves many days, that he may see good?
Keep your tongue from evil, And your lips from speaking ((Eph. 4:25)) deceit.
